nodes.text: Marny was a Twi'lek female who was part of the Wolf Squadron Rebel unit during the Galactic Civil War.

Marny's squadron operated from the planetoid Annamar, hidden deep within a massive asteroid field near the Corellian Trade Spine.
During the Battle of Annamar, she and her squadron were all killed when Vader dropped a BTL Y-wing starfighter on the starfighters stationed in the base.
